imdb.plot outline: Jesse returns home to find her younger cousin, Diana, is engaged to her long-lost ex-boyfriend, Blake. After the reintroduction Jesse and Blake spend a night out together and wake up in the same bed. When Diana hears this news she is ready to end her relationship with Blake. Jesse must convince her that nothing happened between them. Ultimately Diana will make the choice, whether or not to trust Blake or not.
imdb.title: Forks & Lives
plot: A woman returns home to discover her younger cousin is engaged to here ex-lover. All three characters are forced to face issues of love, trust and commitment.::Ben Whalen

Jesse returns home to find her younger cousin, Diana, is engaged to her long-lost ex-boyfriend, Blake. After the reintroduction Jesse and Blake spend a night out together and wake up in the same bed. When Diana hears this news she is ready to end her relationship with Blake. Jesse must convince her that nothing happened between them. Ultimately Diana will make the choice, whether or not to trust Blake or not.::Ben Whalen
